nodes.text: R3-M3 was an R3-series astromech droid manufactured by Industrial Automaton that stood 1.09 meters tall and had blue plating and a transparent dome. It served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War against the Alliance to Restore the Republic. In 0 BBY, the astromech droid was on board the Death Star superweapon while it was in the Yavin system. The Death Star was then destroyed during the Battle of Yavin.

R3-M3 first appeared in the 1977 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. It was first identified in the new Star Wars canon in the 2017 reference book Ultimate LEGO Star Wars. The name originated with a wave of Star Wars: The Legacy Collection figures produced by Hasbro Inc. and released in 2009.
